name: C.U.B.E
description:
C.U.B.E

Is puzzele game, you must finish 45 levels, where you must reach the finish line to finish a levlel, you will use your Intelligence to slove the puzzels in the game !

Mix with colored cubes

You must mix with the color of other colored cubes to get the color of the mix, you do this to cross the rivers with the same color.

Use the capsuls

The capsuls is things with multipe workes, there is how helps you, there is how ask you to do missions to open new things and there is how chang your color.But remeber:do not trust in red capsule!

Be transpernt

you can use the transparent coins to be transpernt, after this you can cross any colored river but you destroy the transpernt rivers!

other

1.This our first game, for this reason we need you support.

2.write your opinions in the comments below.

3.ENJOY!
